history.proof: intros. intros Htrans1 Htrans2. intros. split. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros x y z H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros. intros Htrans1 Htrans2. unfold Transitive. intros x y z H1 H2. destruct Htrans1 as [T1]. destruct Htrans2 as [T2]. split. - apply T1 with y. + apply H1. + apply H2. - apply T2 with y. + apply H1. + apply H2.
